messages.1000094695:
Moves a short distance by thrusting the Knuckle Gear while jumping. When #y[Normal Attack Button]#w is entered while moving, the character attempts aerial catch. When aerial catch on oneself or allies is successful, they will get #y[Enhancement Current]#w and #y[Shield]#w.

#y[Shield]
#yCreates a shield that absorbs damage
#y[Shield] durability HP {0}%

#y[Enhancement Current]
#yATK increases by {1}% of Physical DEF
#yDuration {2} sec
messages.1000093452:
Spreads the Knuckle Gear to absorb energy from the ground. Click #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to cancel the skill.

#yRecovers {0}% of total MP
#yFor every {1} sec, {2} [Steam] is created
For every {3} [Steam], AGI increases by {4}%
Duration {5} sec
messages.1000101974:
#s[Gear Step]
#wAction speed increased by #y{0}%#w

Creates shockwaves by stomping the ground with right foot and lowers the body to dash forward.#y (Stuns enemies when the shockwaves hit them)

Stun rate {1}% 
#yATK {2}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
After #y[Duck]#w, enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to follow it with #v[Command Enhancement]#w skill.
messages.1000096731:
Dashes to the front and hits the enemy up into the air with Knuckle Gear. Enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to turn the body and hit the enemy again. #y(Continue with 3 normal attacks)

#yATK per hit {0}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
It can also be activated by entering #y[Normal Attack Button]#w after #y[Foot Stomp]#w and the skill's attack power will be enhanced.

#yCommand Enhancement {1}% Damage
messages.1000096732:
Charges energy on the knuckle gear and releases it to the front. The energy explodes when nearby enemies are hit and creates consecutive shockwaves.

#yATK {0}%
#y{1}% additional damage for consecutive shockwaves

#v[Command Enhancement]
Can be activated by entering #y[Special Attack Button]#w after #y[Foot Stomp]#w and the skill's attack power will be increased.

#y{2}% of damage for Command Enhancement
messages.1000101975:
#s[Gear Step]
#wAction speed increased by #y{0}%#w

Supports the body with Knuckle Gear and tumbles on the spot to kick the enemy up into the air.

#yATK {1}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
After #y[Duck]#w, you can enter #y[Jump Button]#w to continue with #v[Command Enhancement]#w skill.
messages.1000096733:
Creates shockwaves that lift nearby enemies up into the air. When #y[Normal Attack Button]#w is entered, the character jumps on the spot and hits the ground hard with Knuckle Gear.

#yATK {0}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
It can also be activated by entering #y[Normal Attack Button]#w after #y[Step Up]#w and the skill's attack power will be enhanced.

#yCommand Enhancement {1}% Damage
messages.1000096734:
The character thrusts herself upwards after a handstand to spin and propel forward while hitting enemies.

#yATK per hit {0}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
It can also be activated by entering #y[Special Attack Button]#w after #y[Step Up]#w and the skill's attack power will be enhanced.

#yCommand Enhancement {1}% Damage
messages.1000101976:
#s[Gear Step]
#wAction speed increased by #y{0}%#w 

Creates reverse thrust on Knuckle Gear to evade backwards and creates a current that pulls nearby enemies.

#yATK {1}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
After #y[Duck]#w, you can enter #y[Special Attack Button]#w to continue with #v[Command Enhancement]#w skill.
messages.1000096735:
Jumps to the front and blows nearby enemies away with a knee kick. #y(Continue with 2 normal attacks)

#yATK {0}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
It can also be activated by entering #y[Normal Attack Button]#w after #y[Rock Away]#w and the skill's attack power will be enhanced.

#yCommand Enhancement {1}% Damage
messages.1000096736:
Energy is released from the Knuckle Gear to pull nearby enemies then the output is maximised to shoot upwards with the enemies. #y(Continue with 2 normal attacks)

#yATK {0}%

#v[Command Enhancement]
It can also be activated by entering #y[Special Attack Button]#w after #y[Rock Away]#w and the skill's attack power will be enhanced.

#yCommand Enhancement {1}% Damage
messages.1000094219:
During #s[Gear Step]#w, enter #y[Jump Button]#w to lower the body and dash a short distance. It can also be activated by entering #y[Jump]#w after #y[Body Check]#w.

When continued with #s[Gear Step]#w, the cooldown of #s[Gear Step]#w will be greatly reduced

#yGear Step's cooldown reduced by {0}%
messages.1000094711:
All currents are infused into the Knuckle Gear and the character charges forward. While charging forward, a #y[Vortex]#w is created which moves towards the character for a certain period of time. The #y[Vortex]#w disappears when it collides with the character.

#yATK {0}%
#y[Vortex] maximum duration {1} sec
messages.1000093072:
Jumps on the spot to take a defence stance. When defence is successful, #y[Recovery Current]#w is created in a random direction.

#y[Recovery Current]:#w Recovers HP of allies within the range

#yInvincible for {0} sec when defence is successful
#yCreates 1 [Recovery Current] when defence is successful
#y[Recovery Current] duration {1} sec
#yEvery 2 sec, HP is recovered by {2}%
messages.1000095549:
Jumps into the air to gather currents and hits the ground to attack enemies and create a #y[Shield]#w that protects allies. A certain percentage of the damage on allies will be dealt on the character instead when the shield is active. 

#yATK {0}%
#yDamage of allies within the shield reduced by {1}%
Physical and magical damage increased by {2}%
